import React from 'react' import ReactDom from 'react-dom' import Form from './CreateForm' import FocusTrap from 'focus-trap-react' export const Modal =({ onClickOutside, onKeyDown, modalRef, buttonRef, closeModal, onSubmit, GrouprefundDetail, group }) => { return ReactDom.createPortal(
, document.body ) } export default Modal
